name: Sunset's Ashes
description: Experience the short story of Alex and Nic as they share memories with each other while climbing a mountain together for the first time. For years, Alex has been going for climbs, and trying to get Nic to join. Itâ€™s a chance for them to remember their lives together and know why this climb is so important.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, SP1+ Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It's a short, casual read. I like the pictures and the relaxing feel of the story. I wish it was a longer story, but interesting overall. I recommend everyone try it since it is free. The cliff in the pictures looked like it would be fun to jump off of after playing this game..
